footer.paymentNote: You can find the payment overview for this order in your account. If you require a VAT invoice, please contact the seller.
footer.returnIntro: You can return the item within 30 days after receipt. The process works as follows:
returnSteps: Log in to your account and locate your order.
Open the order details and click on 'Request Return'.
Complete the return request and receive your return label and instructions.
footer.returnOutro: Once the seller confirms receipt of the item in good condition, your payment obligation will be cancelled. If you have already paid, the amount will be refunded.
footer.reviewNote: Your feedback about your purchase experience is greatly appreciated.
footer.supportNote: Please contact the seller through your account if you have questions about the received item. For payment-related questions, visit the customer service page.
